Author: Elmar Calbo
Summary: This runbook will connect to an Azure subscription and switch all Virtual Machines to a Stopped (Deallocated) State but can skip any machine with a certain name. It uses a do-loop, in combination with a try-catch to retry a maximum number of 30 times in case of an error.
Title: Stop all VMs, except certain names, and retry a max. number on errors
UserTags: Microsoft Azure, Windows Azure Virtual Machines, Windows Azure PowerShell
